trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> enumeration specifies the protection scenario enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> 枚举指定此策略强制实施的保护方案。

trans-unit.source: The transport will select between a secure and standard protection scenario depending on the type of channel used.
trans-unit.target: 此传输将在安全保护方案和标准保护方案之间进行选择，具体取决于所使用的通道的类型。

trans-unit.source: For secure protection, integrated Windows authentication is wrapped in a secure channel and has an exactly matching channel binding token with no Service Provider Name (SPN) validation.
trans-unit.target: 对于安全保护，将在安全通道中包装集成 Windows 身份验证，并包含无需执行服务提供程序名称 (SPN) 验证的精确匹配的通道绑定令牌。

trans-unit.source: For standard protection, integrated Windows authentication is optionally wrapped in a secure channel with an optional channel binding token and SPN validation is required.
trans-unit.target: 对于标准保护，可以选择在带可选通道绑定令牌的安全通道中包装集成 Windows 身份验证，但必须执行 SPN 验证。

trans-unit.source: So if the request comes through a secure channel, the channel binding token (CBT) is checked, otherwise the SPN is checked.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果请求是通过安全通道传入的，则检查通道绑定令牌 (CBT)；否则检查 SPN。

trans-unit.source: Integrated Windows authentication is wrapped in a secure channel terminated by a trusted proxy and has a channel binding token with SPN validation required.
trans-unit.target: 在由受信任的代理终结的安全通道中包装集成 Windows 身份验证，并且包含需要 SPN 验证的通道绑定令牌。

trans-unit.source: This requires the presence of a CBT, but the CBT is not checked while the SPN is checked.
trans-unit.target: 这要求存在 CBT，但在检查 SPN 时不会检查 CBT。
